Build

Application Builder and App Instance

This module is responsible for creating fastapi application instances and configurating the instance with the neccessary features

object

class core.build.AppBuilder[source]

Bases: AppBuilderInterface

Application Builder class

This class builds adds features to a new or existing fastapi application instance

Type:

object

add_app_details(title: str | None = None, description: str | None = None) → None[source]

Append features to the fastapi instance

This method is responsible for including details to the fastapi instance

Parameters:

  • title (str) – Title used for the application

  • description (str) – Description for the application

This method is used to handle all exceptions for the application
